usbDebugging.title: Enable USB Debugging
usbDebugging.description: Go to Settings > Developer Options > USB Debugging

oemUnlock.title: Enable OEM Unlock
oemUnlock.description: Go to Settings > Developer Options > OEM Unlocking

guide.title: Unlock Guide
guide.bootloaderWarning:
Unlocking your bootloader will:

• Void your warranty
• Wipe all data on your device
• Potentially brick your device

Proceed only if you understand the risks.
